name: Okashi Towers
description:
Okashi Towers is a Halloween inspired Real Time Strategy game with Tower Defense elements. Gather candy resources to build defensive tower units or go on the offensive and summon cute creatures to attack other player bases.





Summon tower units near your base or other tower units to increase the amount of candy resources received over time. Spend resources to summon offensive units that can be controlled individually or together as a group to find enemy units and their base.





  • Online Multiplayer Up to 8 Players
  • Play with any combination of up to 8 Teams and 8 Players (or NPCs)
  • Create custom designed maps in the Map Builder
  • 4 Factions to choose from, each with a different play style
  • Multi-language Support
